comment: I posted this meme at least times on Twitter, and I meant it. I even paid to be Pro and was verified. Because Gab was the only alternative to Facebook and Twitter censorship from the Left, I was willing to tolerate Gab's open door policy to vile racist declared Nazis. I blocked at least of them, but every day are more. So don't say I was never a supporter of Gab.
